channel.title: [Question]launch a server on whonix?
channel.description: Hello everyone, is it possible to launch a server on whonix? I've tried "no-ip" services to make my ip static, but can find the way how to open the ports, any ideas could be very helpful. Thank you. (Besides airVPN which allows open ports - is too slow to make a connection).

item.title: [Question]launch a server on whonix?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Yes, many options, see:

Whonix – 19 Apr 20

Hosting Location Hidden Services - Whonix

Anonymous Hosting, Comparison Table of Tor Onion Services, VPN with Remote Port Forwarding, PageKite and Anonymous Third Party Hosts

Read full topic
